attributes.action: undertake to examine fully the unique constitutional position of Cornwall, in line with his recent statement on reform of the British Constitution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We welcome the Prime Minister's commitment to building trust in democracy and to empowering citizens and communities. We firmly believe the constitutional case for Cornwall provides strong arguments for a greater degree of Cornish devolution. This has as yet never been acknowledged. On this basis we would urge a thorough investigation of the distinctive constitutional status of Cornwall.
